onyomiExamples.meaning: Saint, St., S., sacred, holy, pure
sacred precincts, sanctuary, consecrated ground, holy ground, issue that is regarded as being off-limits, matter that is not up for discussion
great master of go, great master of shogi

kunyomiExamples.meaning: highly virtuous monk, monk, Buddhist solitary, Buddhist missionary, saint (i.e. a virtuous person), emperor, master, expert
sword hilt shaped similar to the handle of a vajra, plain, wooden sword hilt (as opposed to those wrapped in sharkskin)
Mount Kōya missionary (usu. low-ranking monk), Lethocerus deyrollei (species of giant water bug)
